sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {ChakraProvider, Box, Flex, Text, Container, Stack, Input } from '@chakra-ui/react'

const Sidebar = () => {
    const sticky = {
        position: "-webkit-sticky", /* Safari */
        position: "sticky",
        top: "0"
    };
    return (
        <ChakraProvider>
            <Box w="350px" h="80vh" style={sticky}>
                <Stack direction="column" mt="5px" spacing="15px">
                    <Box>
                        <Input placeholder="Search Twitter" borderColor="#253341" w="350px" h="42px" bg="#253341" borderRadius="20px"/>
                    </Box>
                    <Box w="350px" h="438px" bg="#192734" borderRadius="15px"></Box>
                    <Box w="350px" h="236px" bg="#192734" borderRadius="15px"></Box>
                    <Box>
                        <Stack direction="row" ml="10px">
                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Terms of Service</Text>
                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Privacy Policy</Text>
                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Cookie Policy</Text>
                        </Stack>
                        <Stack direction="row" ml="10px">
                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Ads info</Text>
                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">More</Text>
                            <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">Â© 2021 Twitter, Inc.</Text>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                </Stack>
            </Box>
        </ChakraProvider>
    )
}

export default Sidebar
